title: Is Photo Shop Free

replies.body: No, Photoshop is not free.
replies.body_tagged: No, Photoshop is not free.

replies.body: depends where you get it. No, it's not free but if you torrent it or use a trial version then yes.
replies.body_tagged: depends where you get it. No, it's not free but if you torrent it or use a trial version then yes.

replies.body: Downloading the full version for free is illegal, and you can be caught if you're not careful. I do not recommend it however.
replies.body_tagged: Downloading the full version for free is illegal, and you can be caught if you're not careful. I do not recommend it however.

replies.body: No, Photoshop is most certainly not free. It can cost up to $500. I would recommend Paint.Net. It is essentially a free version of Photoshop as it has all the same features.
replies.body_tagged: No, Photoshop is most certainly not free. It can cost up to $500. I would recommend Paint.Net. It is essentially a free version of Photoshop as it has all the same features.

replies.body: Depends. Some schools and institutions offer it for free. Department of education and communities in New South Wales gives it to free for all students, as well as some other software.
